service.name: scenario-dependency-analyzer
service.description: Meta-intelligence capability for analyzing, visualizing, and optimizing scenario and resource dependencies within Vrooli

postgres.purpose: Store dependency metadata, analysis results, optimization recommendations, and graph data

claude-code.purpose: AI-powered analysis of scenario code, configurations, and proposed scenario descriptions

qdrant.purpose: Semantic similarity matching for proposed scenarios and dependency pattern recognition

redis.purpose: Cache frequently accessed dependency data and analysis results for performance optimization

setup.description: Initialize Scenario Dependency Analyzer with all dependencies

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o scenario-dependency-analyzer-api .
steps.description: Build Go dependency analysis API binary

steps.name: setup-database
steps.description: Initialize PostgreSQL schema and seed initial data

steps.name: initial-analysis
steps.run: echo 'Running initial dependency analysis of existing scenarios...' && ./cli/scenario-dependency-analyzer analyze all --output json > /tmp/initial-analysis.json && echo 'Initial analysis complete. Results saved to /tmp/initial-analysis.json'
steps.description: Perform initial dependency analysis of all existing scenarios

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo 'ðŸ” Scenario Dependency Analyzer initialized
  Graph Visualization: http://localhost:${DEPENDENCY_ANALYZER_UI_PORT}
  Analysis API: http://localhost:${DEPENDENCY_ANALYZER_API_PORT}
  CLI: scenario-dependency-analyzer --help

ðŸ“Š Quick Commands:
  scenario-dependency-analyzer analyze all
  scenario-dependency-analyzer graph combined --format html
  scenario-dependency-analyzer optimize all'
steps.description: Display service access URLs and usage examples

develop.description: Start dependency analyzer with API server and visualization UI

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go dependency analysis API server

steps.name: start-ui
steps.description: Start dependency graph visualization UI server

steps.name: show-running-services
steps.description: Display all running service URLs and CLI info

test.description: Comprehensive testing of dependency analysis capabilities

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build . && rm test-build

steps.name: test-proposed-scenario-analysis
steps.run: curl -sf -X POST http://localhost:${DEPENDENCY_ANALYZER_API_PORT}/api/v1/analyze/proposed -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"name":"test-scenario","description":"A test scenario for validating prediction","requirements":["postgres","ollama"]}'

steps.name: test-database-schema
steps.run: resource-postgres execute 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name IN ("scenario_dependencies", "dependency_graphs", "optimization_recommendations");'

steps.name: test-full-system-analysis
steps.run: ./cli/scenario-dependency-analyzer analyze all --output json > /tmp/test-full-analysis.json && echo 'Full system analysis test completed'
steps.description: Test analysis of all scenarios in the system
